Title: Эрик Нортман
Content: Эрик Нортман - вымышленный персонаж в «Тайнах южного вампира», серии из тринадцати книг, написанных бестселлером «Нью -Йорк Таймс» Шарлиной Харрис. Он вампир, немного более тысячи лет, и впервые представлен в первом романе «Dead до Dark» и появляется во всех последующих романах. Поскольку серия книг рассказана с первого лица в отношении Сьюки Стэкхаус, то, что читатели воспринимают его характер, зависит от того, что понимает Сьюки. Телесериал HBO "True Blood" основан на этой серии книг, и персонаж Эрика Нортмана изображается несколько иначе. Список персонажей «истинной крови» имеет подробное описание персонажа Эрика из телешоу.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Emily Stackhouse
Content: Sometime in the mid 1840s, the botanist Charles Alexander Johns saw Stackhouse's watercolours and asked her to provide illustrations for a series of popular natural history books that he was publishing through the Society for Promoting Christian Knowledge. The first two were "Forest Trees of Britain" (1847) and "A Week at the Lizard" (1848, focusing on the Lizard peninsula in Cornwall); in both, some of the illustrations were engravings based on watercolours by Stackhouse, uncredited, but signed 'E.S.' This was followed by Johns's best-known book, "Flowers of the Field", published in two volumes in 1851 with over 200 uncredited illustrations by Stackhouse. Referred to as "the bible of the amateur botanist," its success was such that it went into more than 50 editions and was still in print a century after it first came out. In addition, after Johns and Stackhouse were dead, the SPCK continued to use Stackhouse's images in other books; it is estimated that they had been printed in at least 15 and as many as 30 different books by the end of the 19th century.

Title: Porsche Boxster/Cayman
Content: Впервые выпущенный в 2006 модельном году, Cayman - это купе, полученное из Porsche второго и третьего поколения Boxster Roadster, стилизованного в своей первой итерации Pinky Lai. Большой процент боксов был собран в Финляндии для Porsche от Valmet Automotive с другими, собранными в Zuffenhausen, Stuttgart. Все кайманы были изготовлены в Финляндии Valmet Automotive. Заместитель председателя Porsche, Хольгер П. Хэертер, сказал, что контракт с Valmet Automotive закончится в 2012 году, и производство Cayman должно было быть передано в Magna Steyr в Граце, Австрия. Поскольку Volkswagen взял на себя контроль над Porsche AG, производство Caymans и Boxsters после 2012 года началось на бывшем заводе Karmann в Оснабрук, Германия, в то время, принадлежащем Volkswagen, а также использовался для производства конференции по гольфу (MK6).
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Ferdinand Porsche
Content: The company also started work on a new design, the Porsche 356, the first car to carry the Porsche brand name. The company then was located in Gmünd in Carinthia, where they had relocated from Stuttgart to avoid Allied bombing. The company started manufacturing the Porsche 356 in an old saw mill in Gmünd. They made only 49 cars, which were built entirely by hand.

Content: The Omo River forms through the confluence of the Gibe River, by far the largest total tributary of the Omo River, and the Wabe River, the largest left-bank tributary of the Omo at . Title: History of Bangladesh
Content: The decision to effect the Partition of Bengal was announced in July 1905 by the Viceroy of India, Lord Curzon. The partition took place on 16 October 1905 and separated the largely Muslim eastern areas from the largely Hindu western areas. The former province of Bengal was divided into two new provinces "Bengal" (comprising western Bengal as well as the province of Bihar and Orissa) and Eastern Bengal and Assam with Dacca as the capital of the latter. Partition was promoted for administrative reasons: Bengal was geographically as large as France and had a significantly larger population. Curzon stated the eastern region was neglected and under-governed. By splitting the province, an improved administration could be established in the east, where subsequently, the population would benefit from new schools and employment opportunities. The Hindus of West Bengal who dominated Bengal's business and rural life complained that the division would make them a minority in a province that would incorporate the province of Bihar and Orissa. Indians were outraged at what they recognised as a "divide and rule" policy.

Title: Notre Dame de Lourdes Church (Fall River, Massachusetts)
Content: With the loss of the church Masses were moved to St. Joseph's Orphanage till a new church could be built. Saturday & Sunday masses were held at Bishop Connolly High School. When the ruins were searched it was found that very little remained from the fire. One stained-glass window, "The Flight into Egypt", was spared destruction due to being in Connecticut for repair. The third Notre Dame was designed and built around this window. The three Angels that had adorned the Sanctuary Lamp and two candlesticks, though in the middle of the blaze, managed to survive the inferno. These too are part of the new church. The Sacred Heart Monument also miraculously survived the blaze even though it was in close proximity to the church. It wasn't until 1986 that the new church was built and ready for use. The orientation of the new building is reverse what the old one was. The new churches "front" sits in the footprint of the old churches "rear". In 2012, it was revealed that the parish of Notre Dame de Lourdes would be merging with the parish of Immaculate Conception in Fall River. This occurred in June 2012 and they will be using Notre Dame as their church, taking on the name St. Bernadette.

claim: Sperm donation is generally considered safe when carried out through licensed sperm banks that follow stringent screening and storage protocols; these facilities are “often controlled by local legislation which is primarily intended to protect the unborn child”
question_en: Is sperm donation safe?
report_en: Sperm donation is generally considered safe when carried out through licensed sperm banks that follow stringent screening and storage protocols; these facilities are “often controlled by local legislation which is primarily intended to protect the unborn child” [1]. To reduce genetic risks such as accidental consanguinity, many jurisdictions cap the number of families or children a single donor can father [1]. While these rules help safeguard recipients, enforcement gaps exist because a bank may ship sperm abroad and donors can give samples at multiple clinics, potentially bypassing local limits [1]. Therefore, the practical level of safety hinges on choosing a reputable, regulated bank that complies with disease testing, genetic screening, and traceability standards, and on confirming that the donor has not exceeded recommended offspring limits.
all_claims: Sperm donation is generally considered safe when carried out through licensed sperm banks that follow stringent screening and storage protocols; these facilities are “often controlled by local legislation which is primarily intended to protect the unborn child” [1].

Title: Donghak Peasant Revolution
Content: In October 22, 2,000 rebels were killed in the consequent Battle of Jajak Pass, the largest battle in Gangwon Province before the Korean War. The rebels lacked guns, and they used birch branches as weapons. They also lacked pots, and cooked rice over cattle hide. Because of the narrowness of the pass, the rebels were crowded, and it was easy for Maeng's troops to fire into the camp and kill rebels. Maeng himself reports that "it was impossible to see how many died", but descendants have given an estimate of 1,800~2,000. Descendants also report that the battle continued for three or four days. The Seonang Pass was renamed Jajak Pass, because the blood made a 'Jajak' sound as it rolled down the pass.

Title: Gona Barracks
Content: The former Gona Barracks is important in demonstrating the pattern of Queensland's history as evidence of Queensland's preparations for military involvement in various world conflicts. Specifically, Gona Barracks is associated with the expansion of military training for militia forces after the introduction of compulsory military training in 1911, the provision of facilities for specialist militia units, and the continuation of voluntary military forces until 1998. The place contains World War I drill halls built for militia units of infantry, and more specialised groups such as the artillery, engineers and service corps, and as such demonstrates the extent of the various sections of the armed forces at the time and the commitment of the citizen soldiers who composed these units. The general size of the barracks site also demonstrates the site's early history as the Brisbane Grammar School endowment, from 1879 to 1911.

Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Tylenol (бренд)
Content: Бренд был представлен в 1955 году McNeil Laboratories, семейным фармацевтическим производителем. В этом году два брата захватили компанию от своего отца, и в том же году один из них узнал о парацетамоле, которого в то время не было на рынке США. Чтобы избежать конкуренции с аспирином, они продали его как продукт, чтобы снизить лихорадку у детей, упаковывать его как красная пожарная машина с лозунгом, «для маленьких хотеров». Название «Tylenol» и общее название «ацетаминофен» были получены McNeil от химического названия препарата. Johnson & Johnson купили McNeil в 1959 году, а год спустя препарат был предоставлен без рецепта.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Burson-Marsteller
Content: At a Burson-Marsteller organized press conference in November 1982, Johnson & Johnson introduced new tamper-proof packaging, becoming the first company to introduce triple-sealed packaging, which later became the industry standard. The conference gave Johnson & Johnson the opportunity to announce that they were reintroducing Tylenol capsules to the market and would replace any Tylenol that consumers had thrown away. In addition, Johnson & Johnson published advertisements with coupons for consumers to use in replacing Tylenol that had been thrown out and produced commercials and print advertisements thanking the public for their "continuing confidence and support". Within six weeks of the introduction of the repackaged product Tylenol's sales returned to the previous level. In 1983, Burson-Marsteller was awarded a Silver Anvil for "out-of-the-ordinary crisis management" for its work with Johnson & Johnson. The company was brought back to handle crisis management during a second Tylenol crisis, involving cyanide tainting in New York in 1986.

Арабские математики расширили систему, чтобы включить десятичные дробь, а Мухаммад ибн Муса аль-Жаризми написал важную работу об этом в 9-м веке. Document ID: 2
Title: Arabic numerals
Content: The Hindu-Arabic numeral system was developed by Indian mathematicians around AD 500 using quite different forms of the numerals. From India, the system was adopted by Arabic mathematicians in Baghdad and passed on to the Arabs farther west. The current form of the numerals developed in North Africa. It was in the North African city of Bejaia that the Italian scholar Fibonacci first encountered the numerals; his work was crucial in making them known throughout Europe. The use of Arabic numerals spread around the world through European trade, books and colonialism.

Эта цифра включает в себя городские графства Кларк, Фокье, Спотсильванию, Стаффорд и Уоррен, а также независимый город Фредериксбург. Вместе эти юрисдикции составляют 407 749 жителей. Объединенное население округов Арлингтон, Фэрфакс, Лоудоун и принц Уильям и независимые города Александрия, Фэрфакс, Фолс -Черч, Манассас и Манассас Парк составляет 2 367 605, что составило 28,66% населения Вирджинии в июле 2013 года.

Title: Tangier, Virginia
Content: As of the census of 2000, there were 605 people, 244 households, and 181 families residing in the town. The population density was 2,448.2 people per square mile (932.8/km). There were 270 housing units at an average density of 1,094.4 per square mile (417.0/km). The racial makeup of the town was 99.50% White and 0.50% African American. In 2006, there were four people from Eastern India, one African American, one Pacific Islander, and several people of American Indian extraction. Many people have familial ties with residents of the Eastern Shore of Virginia as well as places on the western shore, such as Reedville and Urbanna.

Title: Антарктида
Content: Антарктида, расположенная асимметрично вокруг южного полюса и в основном к югу от Антарктики, является самой южной континентом и окружена южным океаном; В качестве альтернативы его можно считать окруженным южной части Тихого океана, Атлантики и индийских океанов, или южными водами мирового океана. В Антарктиде есть несколько рек и озер, самая длинная река - это Оникс. Крупнейшее озеро, Восток, является одним из крупнейших субсколетных озер в мире. Антарктида покрывает больше, чем, делая его пятым по величине континентом, примерно в 1,3 раза больше, чем в Европе. Document ID: 2
Title: Warren B. Hamilton
Content: Hamilton led a two-man field party in Antarctica (October 1958–January 1959) for the International Geophysical Year, and launched a new understanding of Antarctica. He was the first to apply the name trans-Antarctic Mountains (two years later, formalized as Transantarctic Mountains) to that 3,500 km range. Hamilton recognized that a large sector of this range contained distinctive granitic rocks like South Australia's Adelaide orogenic belt. Associated fossils of diverse ages in Antarctica, Australia, and southernmost Africa further linked these continents, and supported then-radical explanations of continental drift. Before traveling to Antarctica, Hamilton was what he later described as a "closet drifter," aware that Southern Hemisphere geology provided powerful evidence favoring continental drift. He returned to Antarctica for fieldwork in 1963 and 1964 in other parts of the Transantarctic Mountains, including those once continuous with other Australian tracts. He also investigated in the field evidence for drift in Australia and South Africa, integrating his work with that of other researchers to show how Antarctica and other Gondwana continents had drifted apart.

Title: 'Салемский участок
Content: Политика в течение времени повлияла на написание короля истории. Коррупция в правительстве была важным фактором в вдохновении истории. Об этом он вспоминает,
В 2005 году Mentipede Press выпустила Deluxe Limited Edition «Лот Салема» с черно -белыми фотографиями Джерри Уэлсманна и двух коротких рассказов «Иерусалимский лот» и «один для дороги», а также более 50 страниц удаленного материала. Книга была ограничена 315 экземплярами, каждая из которых подписана Стивеном Кингом и Джерри Уэлсманном. Книга была напечатана на 100# Superfine Baper, она измерена, была более толстая и весила больше, чем. Книга включала в себя ленточный маркер, головные и хвостовые полосы, строительство ткани с тремя частями и скольжение. Позднее было выпущено безписанное издание в твердом переплете, ограниченное 600 экземплярами. Оба подписанные и без подписи были распроданы. В интервью The Printed Trade Journal "Fine Books & Collections" Кинг сказал о иллюстрированной версии фолио своей «Лот Салема», «Я думаю, это красиво!» Торговое издание было позже опубликовано.

Document ID: 2
Title: The Cat in the Hat
Content: According to Judith and Neil Morgan, the book sold well immediately. The trade edition initially sold an average of 12,000 copies a month, a figure which rose rapidly. Bullock's department store in Los Angeles, California, sold out of its first, 100-copy order of the book in a day and quickly reordered 250 more. The Morgans attribute these sales numbers to "playground word-of-mouth", asserting that children heard about the book from their friends and nagged their parents to buy it for them. However, Houghton Mifflin's school edition did not sell as well. As Geisel noted in Jonathan Cott's 1983 profile of him, "Houghton Mifflin... had trouble selling it to the schools; there were a lot of Dick and Jane devotees, and my book was considered too fresh and irreverent. But Bennett Cerf at Random House had asked for trade rights, and it just took off in the bookstores." Geisel told the Morgans, "Parents understood better than school people the necessity for this kind of reader."

Title: National Debt Clock
Content: The idea of conveying a message through a periodically updated clock found an earlier expression in the Doomsday Clock. However, the innovation of the National Debt Clock was to feature a constantly running counter; it has since inspired similar projects elsewhere, both in the United States and further afield. In particular, it has become a national fixture shows that the U.S.'s increasing debt. By 1995, the "New York Times" reported that politicians were citing the clock to advocate for a reduction to the national budget. Various tracking counters of national debt are also kept online.

claim: Prentice and Miller observed that male students who privately felt less comfortable with campus drinking shifted their attitudes toward what they erroneously believed was the campus norm, exemplifying a dissonance‐driven realignment of private beliefs with perceived public opinion
question_en: Does cognitive dissonance factor into pluralistic ignorance?
report_en: Yes; research indicates that cognitive dissonance can play a role in pluralistic ignorance, but its influence varies by context. Prentice and Miller observed that male students who privately felt less comfortable with campus drinking shifted their attitudes toward what they erroneously believed was the campus norm, exemplifying a dissonance‐driven realignment of private beliefs with perceived public opinion [1]. Female students, however, did not show this attitude change, indicating that dissonance pressure was weaker where drinking norms were less central to identity [1]. Moreover, subsequent work on non-drinkers such as vegetarians shows that pluralistic ignorance can also emerge from the topology of social networks without invoking cognitive dissonance, demonstrating that dissonance is a common but not universal mechanism behind the phenomenon [1].
all_claims: Yes; research indicates that cognitive dissonance can play a role in pluralistic ignorance, but its influence varies by context.

Prentice and Miller observed that male students who privately felt less comfortable with campus drinking shifted their attitudes toward what they erroneously believed was the campus norm, exemplifying a dissonance‐driven realignment of private beliefs with perceived public opinion [1].
Female students, however, did not show this attitude change, indicating that dissonance pressure was weaker where drinking norms were less central to identity [1].

Moreover, subsequent work on non-drinkers such as vegetarians shows that pluralistic ignorance can also emerge from the topology of social networks without invoking cognitive dissonance, demonstrating that dissonance is a common but not universal mechanism behind the phenomenon [1].
claims_retained: Prentice and Miller observed that male students who privately felt less comfortable with campus drinking shifted their attitudes toward what they erroneously believed was the campus norm, exemplifying a dissonance‐driven realignment of private beliefs with perceived public opinion [1].
Female students, however, did not show this attitude change, indicating that dissonance pressure was weaker where drinking norms were less central to identity [1].

Moreover, subsequent work on non-drinkers such as vegetarians shows that pluralistic ignorance can also emerge from the topology of social networks without invoking cognitive dissonance, demonstrating that dissonance is a common but not universal mechanism behind the phenomenon [1].

Title: Плюралистическое невежество
Content: Прентис и Миллер обнаружили, что в среднем частные уровни комфорта с практикой алкоголя в кампусе были намного ниже, чем воспринимаемое среднее. В случае людей они обнаружили изменение частного отношения к этой предполагаемой норме, форме когнитивного диссонанса. У женщин, с другой стороны, было обнаружено повышенное чувство отчуждения в кампусе, но им не хватало изменения отношения, обнаруженных у мужчин, предположительно, потому что нормы, связанные с употреблением алкоголя в кампусе, являются гораздо более важными для мужчин, чем для женщин. Исследования показали, что плюралистическое невежество поражает не только тех, кто потакает, но и тех, кто воздерживается: от азартных игр, курения и употребления алкоголя и среди тех, кто следит за вегетарианством. Последнее обнаружило, что плюралистическое невежество может быть вызвано структурой базовой социальной сети, а не когнитивным диссонансом.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Interpersonal communication
Content: When individuals encounter new information or new experiences, they categorize the information based on their preexisting attitudes, thoughts, and beliefs. If the new encounter does not coincide with their preexisting assumptions, then dissonance is likely to occur. When dissonance does occur, individuals are motivated to reduce the dissonance they experience by avoiding situations that would either cause the dissonance or increase the dissonance. For this reason, cognitive dissonance is considered a drive state that encourages motivation to achieve consonance and reduce dissonance.
An example of cognitive dissonance would be if someone holds the belief that maintaining a healthy lifestyle is important, but they don't regularly work out or eat healthy. They may experience dissonance between their beliefs and their actions. If there is a significant amount of dissonance, they may be motivated to change their attitudes and work out more or eat healthier foods. They may also be inclined to avoid situations that will point out the fact that their attitudes and beliefs are inconsistent, such as avoiding the gym or not reading health reports.According to cognitive dissonance theory, there are three types of cognitive relationships: consonant relationships, dissonant relationships, and irrelevant relationships. Consonant relationships are when two elements, such as your beliefs and actions, are in equilibrium with each other or coincide. Dissonant relationships are when two elements are not in equilibrium and cause dissonance. Irrelevant relationships are when two elements do not possess a meaningful relationship with one another, they are unrelated and do not cause dissonance.
---

If there is a significant amount of dissonance, they may be motivated to change their attitudes and work out more or eat healthier foods. They may also be inclined to avoid situations that will point out the fact that their attitudes and beliefs are inconsistent, such as avoiding the gym or not reading health reports.According to cognitive dissonance theory, there are three types of cognitive relationships: consonant relationships, dissonant relationships, and irrelevant relationships. Consonant relationships are when two elements, such as your beliefs and actions, are in equilibrium with each other or coincide. Dissonant relationships are when two elements are not in equilibrium and cause dissonance. Irrelevant relationships are when two elements do not possess a meaningful relationship with one another, they are unrelated and do not cause dissonance.
---

Пятнадцать членов назначаются президентом Казахстана с целью обеспечения представительства для всех разнообразных национальных культурных компонентов общества.

Title: Теория деятельности (старение)
Content: Теория деятельности, также известная как неявная теория старения, нормальная теория старения и теория Lay of Saring, предлагает, чтобы успешное старение происходило, когда пожилые люди остаются активными и поддерживают социальные взаимодействия. Требуется мнение, что процесс старения откладывается, а качество жизни повышается, когда пожилые люди остаются социально активными. 
Теория деятельности поднялась в противоположном ответе на теорию разъединения. Теория деятельности и теория раскрытия были двумя основными теориями, в которых обрисовало успешное старение в начале 1960 -х годов. Теория была разработана Робертом Дж. Хэвигурстом в 1961 году. В 1964 году Бернис Нойгартен утверждала, что удовлетворение в старости зависит от активного поддержания личных отношений и усилий.

Title: Activity theory

The first international conference on activity theory was not held until 1986. The earliest non-Soviet paper cited by Nardi is a 1987 paper by Yrjö Engeström: "Learning by expanding". This resulted in a reformulation of AT. Kuutti notes that the term "activity theory" "can be used in two senses: referring to the original Soviet tradition or referring to the international, multi-voiced community applying the original ideas and developing them further."

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Жемчужная пивоваренная компания
Content: В 1952 году, когда Ассоциация пивоваренного завода в Сан -Антонио изменила свое название на жемчужную пивоваренную компанию, Triple XS присоединился к названию жемчуга в качестве доминирующего изображения на продукте и компании в целом. Triple XS вернулся на логотип компании и использовался почти на всех рекламных объявлениях Pearl. XS провела эту значительную роль до конца производства на пивоварне в 2001 году, когда пивоварня закрыла свои двери, и логотип компании был заброшен. В качестве производства жемчужного и жемчужного света на заводе Миллера в Форт -Уэрте логотипы продукта были переработаны. Обновленная метка не использует тройной XS, поэтому значительная часть идентификации компании была практически исключена из жемчужного пива. Тем не менее, солодовый ликер Pearl Country Club по -прежнему показывает XXXS в своем логотипе.
Многие люди задаются вопросом, откуда взялись XS и как они когда -либо использовались на пиве. По правде говоря, три XS на самом деле являются качественной системой рейтинга. Система первоначально использовалась в Европе в 16 веке. Поскольку европейская королевская власть путешествовала по их землям и посетил соседние округа, королевский курьер был отправлен впереди официальной партии. Работа курьера состояла в том, чтобы попробовать пиво в гостиницах по пути. Если бы пиво было только средним, курьер отметил бы знак гостиницы или дверь одним X. Если пиво гостиницы считалось хорошим, знак или дверь получили бы два XS. Знак на гостинице трех XS означала, что пиво внутри было превосходным, и обязательным для Королевского двора они проходили.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Pearl Brewing Company
Content: The triple Xs were adopted by the San Antonio Brewing Association to portray two things: the high quality of their beers, and the pride that workers put into their products. The triple Xs may be gone from company and Pearl beer logos, but it has not completely vanished. In the 1960s, Pearl absorbed the Goetz Brewing Company and made Country Club Malt Liquor one of Pearl's key products. claim: Yes, a nerve fiber (axon) can be cut, either traumatically or intentionally during surgery, resulting in loss of motor or sensory function distal to the lesion
question_en: Can you cut a nerve fiber?
report_en: Yes, a nerve fiber (axon) can be cut, either traumatically or intentionally during surgery, resulting in loss of motor or sensory function distal to the lesion [1]. When this occurs, surgeons may attempt microsurgical repair or use autologous nerve grafts, which redirect regenerating donor axons through a graft conduit to re-establish connection with target muscles or skin [1]. Functional recovery after such repair is highly age-dependent: young children often regain near-normal nerve function, whereas patients over 60 years old typically recover only protective sensation, such as the ability to distinguish hot from cold or sharp from dull [1]. Adjunctive strategies like localized delivery of soluble neurotrophic factors are under investigation to accelerate axonal regeneration within grafts [1].

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Нервная травма
Content: Хирургия может быть сделана в случае, если нерв станет сокращением или иным образом разделенным. Восстановление нерва после хирургического восстановления зависит в основном от возраста пациента. Маленькие дети могут восстановить функцию близкого к нормальному нервом. Напротив, пациент старше 60 лет с порезанным нервом в руке рассчитывал бы восстановить только защитное ощущение, то есть способность различать горячие/холодные или острые/скучные. Многие другие факторы также влияют на восстановление нерва. Использование процедур трансплантации аутологичных нерв, которые включают перенаправление регенеративных донорских нервных волокон в канал трансплантата, было успешным в восстановлении целевой мышечной функции. Локализованная доставка растворимых нейротрофических факторов может помочь способствовать скорости регенерации аксонов, наблюдаемой в рамках этих каналов трансплантата.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Neurolytic block
Content: A neurolytic block is a form of nerve block involving the deliberate injury of a nerve by freezing or heating ("neurotomy") or the application of chemicals ("neurolysis"). These interventions cause degeneration of the nerve's fibers and temporary (a few months, usually) interference with the transmission of nerve signals. In these procedures, the thin protective layer around the nerve fiber, the basal lamina, is preserved so that, as a damaged fiber regrows, it travels within its basal lamina tube and connects with the correct loose end, and function may be restored. Surgical cutting of a nerve (neurectomy), severs these basal lamina tubes, and without them to channel the regrowing fibers to their lost connections, over time a painful neuroma or deafferentation pain may develop. This is why the neurolytic is usually preferred over the surgical block.
---

Парк был переименован в национальный парк Санджай Ганди в 1996 году после Санджая Ганди, сына бывшего премьер -министра Индиры Ганди. Title: Sanjay Gandhi National Park
Content: The "karvi" shrub, as it is locally called in the Marathi language, sometimes also spelled as "karvy" in English, only blooms once in eight years in a mass flowering covering the forest floor in a lavender blush. It grows in abundance in the Western Ghats hills near Mumbai including throughout the Sanjay Gandhi National Park as in other parts of its natural range. In Sanjay Gandhi National Park its latest blooming took place in 2008, and it is scheduled to bloom here again in 2016. Termed by nature enthusiasts as 'nature's miracle' its maximum bloom can be seen on some of the inner paths and trails that lie undisturbed in the park. It survives best on the vast sloping expanses of the hillsides, with the Kanheri caves area of the park being one of the best places to observe large areas of blooms.

Title: Пифагорейская теорема
Content: Существует дискуссия, была ли пифагорейская теорема была обнаружена один раз или много раз во многих местах, и дата первого открытия неясна, как и дата первого доказательства. По словам Джорана Фриберга, историка математики, доказательства указывают на то, что теорема Пифагора «была известна математикам старого вавилонского периода» (с 20-го по 16 веков до н.э.), который был бы более тысячи лет до рождения Пифагора. История теоремы может быть разделена на четыре части: знание пифагорейских тройков, знание отношений между сторонами правильного треугольника, знание отношений между соседними углами и доказательства теоремы в некоторой дедуктивной системе.

Title: Project Mathematics!
Content: In 1988, "The Theorem of Pythagoras" was the first video produced by the series and reviews the Pythagorean theorem. For all right triangles, the square of the hypotenuse is equal to the sum of the squares of the other two sides ( a + b = c ). The theorem is named after Pythagoras of ancient Greece. Pythagorean triples occur when all three sides of a right triangle are integers such as a = 3, b = 4 and c = 5. A clay tablet shows that the Babylonians knew of Pythagorean triples 1200 years before Pythagoras, but nobody knows if they knew the more-general Pythagorean theorem. The Chinese proof uses four similar triangles to prove the theorem.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Зубные протезы
Content: Изготовление набора полных зубных протезов является проблемой для любого стоматолога/стоматолога. Есть много аксиомов в производстве зубных протезов, которые должны быть поняты; Невежество одной аксиомы может привести к разрушению зубного протеза. В подавляющем большинстве случаев полные зубные протезы должны быть удобными вскоре после введения, хотя почти всегда по крайней мере два регулировки необходимы для удаления причины воспаленных пятен. Одним из наиболее важных аспектов зубных протезов является то, что впечатление зубного протеза должно быть идеально сделано и используется с идеальной техникой, чтобы сделать точную модель беззубых (беззубых) десен пациента. Стоматолог или стоматолог должны использовать процесс, называемый пограничным формованием, чтобы гарантировать, что фланцы зубного протеза надлежащим образом расширяются. Можно возникнуть множество проблем, если последнее впечатление протеза не произведено должным образом. Для стоматолога требуется значительное терпение и опыт, чтобы узнать, как сделать зубной протез, и по этой причине пациент может быть в интересах пациента искать специалиста, либо протезированного, либо стомата, чтобы сделать протез. Стоматочный и лицензированный профессионал - это обученный и лицензированный профессионал, который видит пациентов, нуждающихся в зубных протезах, частичных, рецидивах или ремонте. Стомат лечения не только снимает впечатление, но и делает весь протез в своей собственной лаборатории. Затем лепесток назначает дату доставки готовых зубных протезов пациенту. Генеральный стоматолог может отлично поработать, но только если он или она тщательно и опытен. Многие стоматологи больше не делают протезы сами. Но вместо этого произнесите впечатление на рот пациентов, а затем либо отправьте впечатления в стоматологическую лабораторию, которая может быть в любой точке мира, либо отправить пациента к стоматочному течению. Как только лаборатория получает зубные впечатления от рта пациента, лаборатория создает от них гипсовые формы. Лаборатория использует формы для создания восковых дисков, используемых для регистрации укуса пациента. Эти восковые диски возвращаются стоматологу, который использует их, чтобы зарегистрировать укус пациента. Стоматолог может помочь пациенту в выборе правильного размера зубов для зубных протезов или просто сделать выбор сам. После завершения регистрации укуса и зубов выбираются для зубных протезов, восковой обод обычно возвращается в стоматологическую лабораторию, чтобы зубы протеза были установлены в воск. После того, как зубы будут установлены в восковом ободке, в результате получается предварительно протешенный зубной протез, который выглядит почти как готовый продукт. Этот предварительный протез обычно возвращается в кабинет стоматолога, и у пациента обычно есть шанс одобрить настройку (для немедленных или стандартных зубных протезов) или попробовать зубной протез до его завершения. После одобрения пациентом стоматолог возвращает предварительную копию в лабораторию для окончательной обработки. Готовый зубной протез затем возвращается в кабинет стоматолога для доставки пациенту.

Title: Denture cleaner
Content: A denture cleaner (also termed denture cleanser), is a cleaner used to clean dentures when they are out of the mouth. Their main use is to control the growth of microorganisms on the dentures, especially "Candida albicans", thereby preventing denture-related stomatitis. When dentures are worn in the mouth, a biofilm develops which may be similar to dental plaque. It may become hardened and mineralized as dental calculus. Denture cleansers are also used to remove stains and other debris that may be caused by diet, tobacco use, drinking coffee, drinking tea, etc.

Title: Социобиология
Content: Например, недавно доминирующие мужские львы часто убивают новичков в гордости, которую они не проходили. Такое поведение является адаптивным, потому что убийство новичков устраняет конкуренцию за их собственное потомство и заставляет медсестер быстрее входить в тепло, что позволяет большему количеству его генов входить в популяцию. Социобиологи будут рассматривать это инстинктивное поведение, убивающее детеныша как унаследованное через гены успешных воспроизведений мужских львов, тогда как не убивающее поведение могло бы вымерено, поскольку эти львы были менее успешными в воспроизведении.

Document ID: 2
Title: Lion
Content: When first introduced to the rest of the pride, lion cubs lack confidence when confronted with adults other than their mother. They soon begin to immerse themselves in the pride life, however, playing among themselves or attempting to initiate play with the adults. Lionesses with cubs of their own are more likely to be tolerant of another lioness's cubs than lionesses without cubs. Male tolerance of the cubs varies – sometimes a male will patiently let the cubs play with his tail or his mane, whereas another may snarl and bat the cubs away.
Weaning occurs after six or seven months. Male lions reach maturity at about three years of age and at four to five years are capable of challenging and displacing adult males associated with another pride. They begin to age and weaken at between 10 and 15 years of age at the latest. When one or more new males oust the previous males associated with a pride, the victors often kill any existing young cubs, perhaps because females do not become fertile and receptive until their cubs mature or die. Females often fiercely defend their cubs from a usurping male but are rarely successful unless a group of three or four mothers within a pride join forces against the male. Cubs also die from starvation and abandonment, and predation by leopards, hyenas and wild dogs. Up to 80% of lion cubs will die before the age of two.

claim: In video-game design, “nerfing” refers to deliberately reducing the power, desirability, or overall effectiveness of a specific game element—such as a weapon, ability, or character—in order to improve balance and fairness; the term functions both as a noun (“a nerf”) and a verb (“to nerf”)
question_en: What does nerfing mean?
report_en: In video-game design, “nerfing” refers to deliberately reducing the power, desirability, or overall effectiveness of a specific game element—such as a weapon, ability, or character—in order to improve balance and fairness; the term functions both as a noun (“a nerf”) and a verb (“to nerf”) [1]. The expression originated among players of the 1997 MMORPG Ultima Online, where frustrated users likened weakened virtual weapons to foam Nerf-brand toys whose soft projectiles are unlikely to cause serious harm, highlighting how the adjustment makes an element less threatening without removing it entirely [1].
all_claims: In video-game design, “nerfing” refers to deliberately reducing the power, desirability, or overall effectiveness of a specific game element—such as a weapon, ability, or character—in order to improve balance and fairness; the term functions both as a noun (“a nerf”) and a verb (“to nerf”) [1].

The expression originated among players of the 1997 MMORPG Ultima Online, where frustrated users likened weakened virtual weapons to foam Nerf-brand toys whose soft projectiles are unlikely to cause serious harm, highlighting how the adjustment makes an element less threatening without removing it entirely [1].

Title: Игровой баланс
Content: NERF - это изменение игры, которая снижает желательность или эффективность определенного игрового элемента. Термин также используется в качестве глагола для акта внесения таких изменений. Первое установленное использование термина была в «Ultima Online», как ссылка на бренд игрушек NERF, пули которых мягкие и с меньшей вероятностью принесут серьезные травмы.

Document ID: 2
Title: Nerf war
Content: A Nerf war is an activity involving Nerf Blasters or other foam-firing toy weapons. Nerf wars can be a wide range of games, from informal shootouts in offices and basements to well-organized outdoor battles with high-powered modified blasters. Since foam-firing guns are relatively safe and cheap, Nerf wars can include participants and battlefields otherwise unsuitable for airsoft and paintball.
Nerf wars can take place anywhere. Any area with a good balance of open space and cover can be a candidate. Basements, offices, and backyards are common locations for informal games. For larger wars with more participants, bigger venues like gymnasiums, public parks, forests, ravines, and schools make good playing areas. The inside of a large hall such as a room can may be turned into a battlefield by turning tables onto their sides. When planning a Nerf war in a public area, the organizer typically reserves the space and watches out for non-participants to reduce any liability. The ability to play in free locations is an important element of a Nerf war's accessibility.
---

When planning a Nerf war in a public area, the organizer typically reserves the space and watches out for non-participants to reduce any liability. The ability to play in free locations is an important element of a Nerf war's accessibility.

Title: Game Show Network
Content: Game Show Network запущена в 7:00 вечера. ET 1 декабря 1994 года. Первым эфирным игровым шоу было «Какая у меня линия?». С 1994 года до 1997 года сеть транслировала классические игровые шоу до 1972 года, а также игровые шоу, сделанные после 1972 года, большинство из которых поступили из библиотеки Марка Гудсона-Билл Тодман. Игра в сети показывает игру в 24-часовом цикле, а также использовала живые интерстиции в качестве программирования обертков. В первые несколько месяцев рекламные ролики GSN состояли из объявлений о государственных услугах (PSA), рекламных акций для его программирования и рекламных роликов, связанных с сетевой материнской компанией Sony. К 1995 году, когда сеть начала расширяться, сеть начала принимать традиционную рекламу, поскольку она получила новые спонсорство. 17 марта 1997 года сеть Game Show переименована в новую презентационную пакет и новый логотип (который имел название сети в коробках и красочный кружащий мяч) и новым лозунгом «все играют, весь день». В то время как логотип изменился, его программирование оставалось неизменным, сеть также дебютировала с новыми рекламными акциями и новыми идентификаторами в тот день, которые были разработаны графическим агентством Lee Hunt Associates.

The channel also launched original shows such as "Extreme Gong" (a remake of the classic "Gong Show"). In 2000, the network faced another setback when GSN lost the rights to broadcast "The Price Is Right", with the last episode airing on April 3 of that year.

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Специальные лекарства в Соединенных Штатах
Content: Специальные лекарства или специальные фармацевтические препараты-это недавнее обозначение фармацевтических препаратов, которые классифицируются как высокая, высокая сложность и/или высокое прикосновение. Специальные препараты часто являются биологическими препаратами - «препараты, полученные из живых клеток», которые инъецируются или инъецируют (хотя некоторые являются пероральными препаратами). Они используются для лечения сложных или редких хронических состояний, таких как рак, ревматоидный артрит, гемофилия, H.I.V. Псориаз, воспалительное заболевание кишечника и гепатит С. В 1990 году на рынке было 10 специальных препаратов, в середине 1990-х годов было менее 30, к 2008 году было 200 лет, а к 2015 году 300. Препараты часто определяются как специальность, поскольку их цена намного выше, чем у не специальных лекарств. Medicare определяет любой препарат, на который согласованная цена составляет 670 долл. США в месяц или более, как специальный препарат, который помещается в специальный уровень, который требует более высокого распределения затрат пациента. Препараты также идентифицируются как специальность, когда существует специальное требование к обработке, или препарат доступен только через сеть ограниченных распределений. По данным IMS Health, к «специальным лекарствам в 2015 году приходилось треть всех расходов на лекарства в Соединенных Штатах, по сравнению с 19 процентами в 2004 году и направляясь к 50 процентам», согласно данным IMS Health, который отслеживает рецепты. Согласно статье 2010 года в Forbes, специальные лекарства от редких заболеваний стали более дорогими, «чем кто -либо себе представлял», и их успех наступил «в то время, когда традиционный бизнес по продаже лекарств в массы» был «в упадке». В 2015 году анализ «The Wall Street Journal» предположил, что большая премия была связана с воспринимаемой ценностью редких заболеваний, которые обычно очень дороги по сравнению с лечением для более распространенных заболеваний.
---

Title: Specialty drugs in the United States
Content: On September 27, 2007 President George W. Bush amended the Food and Drug Administration Amendments Act of 2007 (FDAAA) to authorize the FDA to require Risk Evaluation and Mitigation Strategies (REMS) on medications if necessary to minimize the risks associated with some drugs". These medications were designated as specialty drugs and required specialty pharmacies. When the FDA approves a new drug they may require a REMS program which "may contain any combination of 5 criteria: Medication Guide, Communication Plan, Elements to Assure Safe Use, Implementation System, and Timetable for Submission of Assessments". "In 2010, 48% of all new molecular entities, and 60% of all new specialty drug approvals, required a REMS program." Risk-reduction mechanisms can include the "use of specialized distribution partners", special pharmacy.

Title: Larry Hoover
Content: On the evening of February 26, 1973, William "Pooky" Young, a 19-year old neighborhood youth drug dealer, was abducted and later shot to death in an alley near 68th Street and Union Avenue in Chicago's Englewood neighborhood. His killing was ordered by Hoover after his name was mentioned as one of three people accused of stealing drugs and money from the gang five days earlier. prompt:

Title: История региона Отаго
Content: Точная дата, когда первые жители Новой Зеландии достигли Отаго, и крайний юг (известный более поздний маори как «Мурихику»), остается неопределенной. Маори спускается от расы полинезийских моря-любителей, которые переехали из Восточной Азии и Юго-Восточной Азии на острова Тихого океана. Традиция рассказывает об их дальнейших путешествиях из Хавайки в Новую Зеландию, и некоторые комментаторы определили эту родину как Хавайи, остров в общественной группе. Переполнение, нехватка еды и гражданской войны заставили многих из них снова мигрировать, и Новая Зеландия стала их новым домом. Маори поселилась Новая Зеландия между 1280–1320 гг. Они быстро научились охотиться на многочисленных видов MOA и тюленей в Новой Зеландии и поселились через северные и южные острова менее чем за несколько десятилетий. С тех пор 600 лет назад произошли изменения в пыльце от Внутреннего Отаго из леса до Брэкен -Флоры. Было выяснено, что это связано с освещением пожаров во время исследования маори.

Document ID: 2
Title: History of New Zealand
Content: The history of New Zealand dates back at least 700 years to when it was discovered and settled by Polynesians, who developed a distinct Māori culture centred on kinship links and land. The first European explorer to sight New Zealand was Dutch navigator Abel Tasman on 13 December 1642. The Dutch were also the first non-natives to explore and chart New Zealand's coastline. Captain James Cook, who reached New Zealand in October 1769 on the first of his three voyages, was the first European explorer to circumnavigate and map New Zealand. From the late 18th century, the country was regularly visited by explorers and other sailors, missionaries, traders and adventurers. In 1840 the Treaty of Waitangi was signed between the British Crown and various Māori chiefs, bringing New Zealand into the British Empire and giving Māori the same rights as British subjects. There was extensive British settlement throughout the rest of the century and into the early part of the next century. War and the imposition of a European economic and legal system led to most of New Zealand's land passing from Māori to Pākehā (European) ownership, and most Māori subsequently became impoverished.

Он также внес свой вклад в юношескую футбольную программу, которая стала известна как Поп -Уорнер Little Scholars, популярная молодежная американская футбольная организация.

"Law 6: The pitch". The pitch is a rectangular area of the ground long and wide. The Ground Authority selects and prepares the pitch, but once the game has started, the umpires control what happens to the pitch. The umpires are also the arbiters of whether the pitch is fit for play, and if they deem it unfit, with the consent of both captains can change the pitch. Content: The Northern Isles (; ; ) are a pair of archipelagos off the north coast of mainland Scotland, comprising Orkney and Shetland. The climate is cool and temperate and much influenced by the surrounding seas. There are a total of 26 inhabited islands with landscapes of the fertile agricultural islands of Orkney contrasting with the more rugged Shetland islands to the north, where the economy is more dependent on fishing and the oil wealth of the surrounding seas. Both have a developing renewable energy industry. They also share a common Pictish and Norse history. Both island groups were absorbed into the Kingdom of Scotland in the 15th century and remained part of the country following the formation of the Kingdom of Great Britain in 1707, and later the United Kingdom after 1801. The islands played a significant naval role during the world wars of the 20th century.

Тихоокеанская война увидела первые военно -морские битвы, где комбатанты взаимодействовали друг друга с самолетами вместо кораблей. Title: Kenneth Whiting
Content: Whiting sometimes is referred to as the U.S. Navys "father of the aircraft carrier." He had begun agitating for U.S. Navy development of what were then called "plane carriers" in the spring of 1916, and as early as March 1917 he had proposed to United States Secretary of the Navy Josephus Daniels that the Navy acquire a ship with an aircraft catapult and a flight deck, prompting the first serious U.S. Navy consideration of the acquisition of any kind of aviation ship since the American Civil War of 1861–1865. The United States Department of the Navy rejected his proposal on 20 June 1917. In the years between World War I and World War II, however, Whiting would be instrumental in the construction of five of the U.S. Navys first six aircraft carriers and serve as executive officer of its first two. He also served as acting commanding officer of its first carrier at a time when the United States was experimenting with many aspects of the operation of aircraft carriers and their aircraft.

claim: If the Vice President-elect dies before the Electoral College meets, the winning party’s national committee—after consulting the President-elect—selects a replacement for electors to support, ensuring a Vice President-elect is in place to be first in the line of succession once the new term begins
question_en: What happens when the president and VP of the USA die?
report_en: If a sitting President and Vice President die simultaneously, the Presidential Succession Act makes the Speaker of the House the next in line; if the Speaker is unwilling or constitutionally ineligible, succession passes to the President pro tempore of the Senate and then through Cabinet officers in a fixed order, each of whom must resign any congressional seat and meet the constitutional requirements for the presidency. If the Vice President-elect dies before the Electoral College meets, the winning party’s national committee—after consulting the President-elect—selects a replacement for electors to support, ensuring a Vice President-elect is in place to be first in the line of succession once the new term begins [1]. Should such a vacancy arise after electors have voted, no substitute is chosen; instead, once inaugurated, the new President nominates a Vice President under the Twenty-fifth Amendment, subject to majority approval in both houses of Congress [1].
all_claims: If a sitting President and Vice President die simultaneously, the Presidential Succession Act makes the Speaker of the House the next in line; if the Speaker is unwilling or constitutionally ineligible, succession passes to the President pro tempore of the Senate and then through Cabinet officers in a fixed order, each of whom must resign any congressional seat and meet the constitutional requirements for the presidency.

If the Vice President-elect dies before the Electoral College meets, the winning party’s national committee—after consulting the President-elect—selects a replacement for electors to support, ensuring a Vice President-elect is in place to be first in the line of succession once the new term begins [1].

Should such a vacancy arise after electors have voted, no substitute is chosen; instead, once inaugurated, the new President nominates a Vice President under the Twenty-fifth Amendment, subject to majority approval in both houses of Congress [1].
claims_retained: If the Vice President-elect dies before the Electoral College meets, the winning party’s national committee—after consulting the President-elect—selects a replacement for electors to support, ensuring a Vice President-elect is in place to be first in the line of succession once the new term begins [1].

Should such a vacancy arise after electors have voted, no substitute is chosen; instead, once inaugurated, the new President nominates a Vice President under the Twenty-fifth Amendment, subject to majority approval in both houses of Congress [1].

Content: Если избранный вице-президент умирает или уходит в отставку «до» заседания избирательного колледжа в декабре, национальный комитет победившей партии, по консультации с избранным президентом, выберет замену для получения голосов избирателей кандидата в вице-президенты таким же образом, как это произойдет, если бы бывший вице-кандидат стал президентом из-за избирательного президента из-за смерти очевидного Winner. Предполагая необходимое число, которое избиратели согласились проголосовать за кандидата в замену, этот человек тогда станет избранным вице-президентом. Если такая вакансия произойдет «после того, как в штатах были вынесены голоса на выборах, большинство властей утверждают, что не будет выбрана никакая замена, и новый президент (после вступления в должность) назначит вице-президента в соответствии с положениями двадцати пятой поправки к Конституции.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: United States Constitution
Content: The Twenty-fifth Amendment (1967) clarifies what happens upon the death, removal, or resignation of the President or Vice President and how the Presidency is temporarily filled if the President becomes disabled and cannot fulfill the responsibilities of the office. It supersedes the ambiguous succession rule established in . A concrete plan of succession has been needed on multiple occasions since 1789. However, for nearly 20% of U.S. history, there has been no vice president in office who can assume the presidency.
---

Title: Second Boer War
Content: The number of horses killed in the war was at the time unprecedented in modern warfare. For example, in the Relief of Kimberley, French's cavalry rode 500 horses to their deaths in a single day. The wastage was particularly heavy among British forces for several reasons: overloading of horses with unnecessary equipment and saddlery, failure to rest and acclimatise horses after long sea voyages and, later in the war, poor management by inexperienced mounted troops and distant control by unsympathetic staffs. The average life expectancy of a British horse, from the time of its arrival in Port Elizabeth, was around six weeks.

claim: Buddhism does not incorporate belief in Jesus as the divine Son of God or as a unique savior; its orientation is non-theistic, regarding the existence of a creator deity—and by extension Christian claims about Jesus—as largely irrelevant to the path of liberation
question_en: Does Buddhism believe in Jesus?
report_en: Buddhism does not incorporate belief in Jesus as the divine Son of God or as a unique savior; its orientation is non-theistic, regarding the existence of a creator deity—and by extension Christian claims about Jesus—as largely irrelevant to the path of liberation [1]. While Christianity places monotheism and the crucifixion of Jesus, viewed as the once-for-all atonement for sin, at the center of faith, these concepts have no doctrinal counterpart in Buddhism, whose teachings focus instead on personal karma, the Four Noble Truths, and the Eightfold Path [1]. Individual Buddhists might respect Jesus as an ethical teacher, but traditional Buddhist scriptures neither mention him nor attribute salvific significance to his life or death.
all_claims: Buddhism does not incorporate belief in Jesus as the divine Son of God or as a unique savior; its orientation is non-theistic, regarding the existence of a creator deity—and by extension Christian claims about Jesus—as largely irrelevant to the path of liberation [1].

Individual Buddhists might respect Jesus as an ethical teacher, but traditional Buddhist scriptures neither mention him nor attribute salvific significance to his life or death.
claims_retained: Buddhism does not incorporate belief in Jesus as the divine Son of God or as a unique savior; its orientation is non-theistic, regarding the existence of a creator deity—and by extension Christian claims about Jesus—as largely irrelevant to the path of liberation [1].

Title: Shinji Takahashi (religious leader)
Content: Takahashi preached that Buddhism and Christianity in the present age have become academic, or formalized, and changed into a faith based on other powers. In response to this, he advocated returning to the times of Gotama Siddhartha and Jesus Christ in many of his literary works, starting with “"Ningen/Shaka"” (“Human Beings/Gotama Buddha”). In addition, Takahashi emphasized that neither Jesus Christ nor Gotama Siddhartha preached the thoughts of other powers at all, and that Christianity and Buddhism in their respective times were not complicated like the Christianity and Buddhism of today. With regard to the thoughts of other powers influencing these religions, these laws of nature (the pure religious base of Buddhism, Islam, and Christianity) transformed as a result of the intentions of those who were in power over time, as well as the interpretations of the many scholars; the cores of these laws of nature were lost, various theories became mixed, and they became academized in a complex manner and lost their substance. In addition, these laws of nature were intentionally distorted and conveyed to people for the purpose of individual's own benefit, and people were made to believe that those who obstructed this would be met with strict counteractions. This new set of distorted laws were slowly deemed as being the laws of nature as taught in today's versions of those religions.
---

Title: Испанский язык
Content: Ассоциация академий испанского языка (или) - это организация, которая регулирует испанский язык. Он был создан в Мексике в 1951 году и представляет собой профсоюз всех отдельных академий в испанском мире. Он включает в себя академии из 23 стран, заказанных в Фонде Даты Академии: Испания (1713), Колумбия (1871), Эквадор (1874), Мексика (1875), Эльвадор (1876), Венесуэла (1883), Чили (1885), Перу (1887), Гватемала (1887), Костта), Костта), 1985). (1924), Панама (1926), Куба (1926),
Paraguay (1927), Доминиканская Республика (1927), Боливия (1927), Никарагуа (1928), Аргентина (1931), Уругвай (1943), Гондурас (1949), Пуэрто -Рико (1955), Соединенные Штаты (1973) и экваториальная Гунея (2016).
(Институт Сервантеса) - это мировая некоммерческая организация, созданная испанским правительством в 1991 году. Эта организация разветвляется в более чем 20 разных странах, с 54 центрами, посвященными испанским и испаноязычным американским культурам и испанскому языку. Конечные цели института состоит в том, чтобы повсеместно способствовать образованию, исследованию и использованию испанского в качестве второго языка, для поддержки методов и деятельности, которые помогают процессу образования на испанском языке, и внести свой вклад в развитие культур испанских и латиноамериканских американских в странах, не говорящих по-испаноязычным. В отчете Института за 2015 год «El Español, Una Lengua Viva» (испанский, живой язык), по всему миру 559 миллионов носителей испанского языка. Среди источников, упомянутых в отчете,-Бюро переписей США, которое, по оценкам, к 2050 году в США будет 138 миллионов носителей испанского языка, что делает его самой большой испаноязычной нацией на земле, с испанским родным языком почти трети своих граждан.

Title: Nicaraguans
Content: Spanish is spoken by about 90% of the country's population. In Nicaragua the Voseo form is common, just as in other countries in Central and South America like Honduras, Argentina, Uruguay or coastal Colombia. Spanish has many different dialects spoken throughout Latin America, Central American Spanish is the dialect spoken in Nicaragua. In the Caribbean coast many afro-Nicaraguans and creoles speak English and creole English as their first language. Also in the Caribbean coast, many Indigenous people speak their native languages, such as the Miskito, Sumo, Rama and Garifuna language. In addition, many ethnic groups in Nicaragua, such as the Chinese Nicaraguans and Palestinian Nicaraguans, have maintained their ancestral languages, which are minority languages, while also speaking Spanish and/or English. These minority languages include Chinese, Arabic, German, and Italian, among others.

Title: Lin Biao
Content: Lin Biao (December 5, 1907 – September 13, 1971) was a Marshal of the People's Republic of China who was pivotal in the Communist victory in the Chinese Civil War, especially in Northeast China. Lin was the general who commanded the decisive Liaoshen and Pingjin Campaigns, in which he co-led the Manchurian Field Army to victory and led the People's Liberation Army into Beijing. He crossed the Yangtze River in 1949, decisively defeated the Kuomintang and took control of the coastal provinces in Southeast China. He ranked third among the Ten Marshals. Zhu De and Peng Dehuai were considered senior to Lin, and Lin ranked directly ahead of He Long and Liu Bocheng.

Это один из крупнейших видов совы, и женщины могут расти до общей длины 75 см (30 дюймов), с размах крыльев 188 см (6 футов 2 дюйма), мужчины немного меньше. Недорубые часы представляют собой варьерный бафф, полосатый более темным цветом. Лицевой диск плохо развит, а оранжевые глаза отличительны.

Title: Eurasian eagle-owl
Content: The Eurasian eagle-owl is a very large bird, smaller than the golden eagle ("Aquila chrysaetos") but larger than the snowy owl, despite some overlap in size with both species. It is sometimes referred to as the world's largest owl, although Blakiston's fish owl ("B. blakistoni") is slightly heavier on average and the much lighter weight great grey owl ("Strix nebulosa") is slightly longer on average. Heimo Mikkola reported the largest specimens of eagle-owl as having the same upper body mass, , as the largest Blakiston’s fish owl and attained a length of around longer. In terms of average weight and wing size, the Blakiston’s is the slightly larger species seemingly, even averaging a bit larger in these aspects than the biggest eagle-owl races from Russia. Also, although shorter than the largest of the latter species, the Eurasian eagle-owl can weigh well more than twice as much as the largest great grey owl. The Eurasian eagle-owl typically has a wingspan of , with the largest specimens possibly attaining . The total length of the species can vary from . Females can weigh from and males can weigh from . In comparison, the barn owl ("Tyto alba"), the world's most widely distributed owl species, weighs about 500 g (1.1 lb) and the great horned owl ("Bubo virginianus"), which fills the eagle-owl's ecological niche in North America, weighs around 1.4 kg (3.1 lb).

Title: SS Great Eastern
Content: An early example of breaking-up a structure by use of a wrecking ball, she was scrapped at New Ferry on the River Mersey by Henry Bath & Son Ltd in 1889–1890 – it took 18 months to take her apart. At the time Everton Football Club were looking for a flagpole for their Anfield ground, and consequently purchased her top mast. It still stands there today at the ground - now owned by Liverpool Football Club (formed 1892), at the Kop end. In 2011, the Channel 4 programme "Time Team" found geophysical survey evidence to suggest that residual iron parts from the ship's keel and lower structure still reside in the foreshore.
During 1859, when "Great Eastern" was off Portland conducting trials, an explosion aboard blew off one of the funnels. The funnel was salvaged and subsequently purchased by the water company supplying Weymouth and Melcombe Regis in Dorset, UK, and used as a filtering device. It was later transferred to the Bristol Maritime Museum close to Brunel's SS "Great Britain" then moved to the SS "Great Britain" museum.

Title: Джонатан Свифт
Content: Джонатан Свифт родился 30 ноября 1667 года в Дублине, Ирландия. Он был вторым ребенком и единственным сыном Джонатана Свифта (1640–1667) и его жены Эбигейл Эрик (или Херрик) из Фрисби на «Верке». Его отец был уроженцем Гудрича, Херефордшир, но он сопровождал своих братьев в Ирландию, чтобы добиться их состояния в соответствии с законом после того, как имущество отца их роялистов было разрушено во время гражданской войны в английском. Его дедушка по материнской линии, Джеймс Эрикке, был викарием Торнтона, Англия. В 1634 году викарий был осужден за пуританские практики. Некоторое время после этого Эрикке и его семья, включая его маленькую дочь Абильгайл, бежали в Ирландию.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: A Tale of a Tub
Content: Born of English parents in Ireland, Jonathan Swift was working as Sir William Temple's secretary at the time he composed "A Tale of a Tub" (1694–1697). The publication of the work coincided with Swift's striking out on his own, having despaired of getting a good "living" from Temple or Temple's influence. There is speculation about what caused the rift between Swift and his employer, but, as A. C. Elias persuasively argues, it seems that the final straw came with Swift's work on Temple's "Letters." Swift had been engaged to translate Temple's French correspondence, but Temple, or someone close to Temple, edited the French text to make Temple seem both prescient and more fluent. Consequently, the letters and the translations Swift provided did not gibe, and, since Swift could not accuse Temple of falsifying his letters, and because the public would never believe that the retired state minister had lied, Swift came across as incompetent.
Even though Swift published the "Tale" as he left Temple's service, it was conceived earlier, and the book is a salvo in one of Temple's battles. Swift's general polemic concerns an argument (the "Quarrel of the Ancients and the Moderns") that had been over for nearly ten years by the time the book was published. The "Quarrel of the Ancients and Moderns" was a French academic debate of the early 1690s, occasioned by Fontenelle arguing that modern scholarship had allowed modern man to surpass the ancients in knowledge. Temple argued against this position in his "On Ancient and Modern Learning" (where he provided the first English formulation of the commonplace that modern critics see more only because they are dwarves standing on the shoulders of giants), and Temple's somewhat naive essay prompted a small flurry of responses. Among others, two men who took the side opposing Temple were Richard Bentley (classicist and editor) and William Wotton (critic).
---

prompt:
Information: Document ID: 1
Title: Зрительный нерв
Content: Связый нерв покидает орбиту (глазное гнездо) через зрительный канал, проходит постеро-медиально в направлении зрительного хиазма, где существует частичное дециссирование (пересечение) волокон от визуальных полей (носовая геми-ритина) обоих глаз. Доля декоративных волокон варьируется между видами и коррелирует со степенью бинокулярного зрения, которую пользуется видом. Большая часть аксонов зрительного нерва заканчивается в боковом ядре геникуляции, откуда передается информация в зрительную кору, в то время как другие аксоны заканчиваются в претендовом ядре и участвуют в рефлексивных движениях глаз. Другие аксоны заканчиваются в супрахиазматическом ядре и участвуют в регулировании цикла сна бодрствования. Его диаметр увеличивается с примерно 1,6 мм в глазах до 3,5 мм на орбите до 4,5 мм в пределах черепа. Длина компонента зрительного нерва составляет 1 мм в мире, 24 мм на орбите, 9 мм в зрительном канале и 16 мм в черепном пространстве, прежде чем присоединиться к хиазме зрительного звена. Там происходит частичное освобождение, и около 53% волокон пересекаются, образуя зрительные тракты. Большинство из этих волокон заканчиваются в боковой геникуляционной организме.
---
Document ID: 2
Title: Optic nerve
Content: The optic nerve is the second of twelve paired cranial nerves and is technically part of the central nervous system, rather than the peripheral nervous system because it is derived from an out-pouching of the diencephalon (optic stalks) during embryonic development. As a consequence, the fibers of the optic nerve are covered with myelin produced by oligodendrocytes, rather than Schwann cells of the peripheral nervous system, and are encased within the meninges. Peripheral neuropathies like Guillain–Barré syndrome do not affect the optic nerve. However, most typically the optic nerve is grouped with the other eleven cranial nerves and considered to be part of the peripheral nervous system.
---

Title: Ashley Montagu
Content: One of his works, "Man's Most Dangerous Myth", was written while race was considered the determinant of people's character and intelligence (Rowman and Littlefield). Montagu presented a unique theory for his time: "in biology race is defined as a subdivision of species which inherits physical characteristics distinguishing it from other populations of the species. In this sense there are many human 'races.' But this is not the sense in which many anthropologists, race-classifiers, and racists have used the term." He admits that in a biological sense, there is the existence of races within mankind. However, he also believes that not all of mankind can be classified. Part of his reasoning has to do with mixed origin, which has resulted in “overlapping” of physicalities. Instead of races and subspecies, he prefers mixed ethnic groups. His writing further emphasizes the complexity of our descent and rejects claims that support one race being superior when compared to others. He also says profoundly that the "so-called" main divisions of mankind are species instead of races.

В 1993 году кардинал Бэзил Хьюм, архиепископ Вестминстера, посетил школу для мессы, чтобы отпраздновать свое 100 -летие.

Title: Westminster Cathedral
Content: The founder of Westminster Cathedral, Cardinal Herbert Vaughan laid great emphasis on the beauty and integrity of the cathedral's liturgy. Initially, he determined there should be a community of Benedictine monks at the new cathedral, performing the liturgies and singing the daily Office. This caused great resentment amongst the secular clergy of the diocese, who felt they were being snubbed. In the end, negotiations with both the English Benedictines and the community of French Benedictines at Farnborough failed and a 'traditional' choir of men and boys was set up instead. Despite great financial problems, the Choir School opened on 5 October 1901 with eleven boy choristers, in the building originally intended for the Benedictine monks. Cardinal Vaughan received the boys with the words "You are the foundation stones". The Cathedral Choir was officially instituted three months later in January 1902. Sung Masses and Offices were immediately established when the cathedral opened for worship in 1903, and have continued without interruption ever since. Today, Westminster Cathedral Choir is the only professional Catholic choir in the world to sing daily Mass and Vespers.
---

Title: Microdialysis
Content: There are a variety of probes with different membrane and shaft length combinations available. The molecular weight cutoff of commercially available microdialysis probes covers a wide range of approximately 6-100kD, but also 1MD is available. While water-soluble compounds generally diffuse freely across the microdialysis membrane, the situation is not as clear for highly lipophilic analytes, where both successful (e.g. corticosteroids) and unsuccessful microdialysis experiments (e.g. estradiol, fusidic acid) have been reported. However, the recovery of water-soluble compounds usually decreases rapidly if the molecular weight of the analyte exceeds 25% of the membrane’s molecular weight cutoff.

Title: Lake Victoria
Content: Most of these lakes are relatively shallow (like Victoria) and part of the present-day upper Nile basin. The exception is Lake Kivu, which is part of the present-day Congo River basin, but is believed to have been connected to Lakes Edward and Victoria by rivers until the uplifting of parts of the East African Rift. This deep lake may have functioned as an "evolutionary reservoir" for this haplochromine group in periods where other shallower lakes in the region dried out, as happened to Lake Victoria about 15,000 years ago. In recent history only Lake Kyoga was easily accessible to Victoria cichlids, as further downstream movement by the Victoria Nile (to Lake Albert) is prevented by a series of waterfalls, notably Murchison. In contrast, the Owen Falls (now flooded by a dam) between Victoria and Kyoga were essentially a series of rapids that did not effectively block fish movements between the two lakes.
---

В оригинальном здании не было башни, которая была построена в 1614 году и завершено в 1623 году мастером мастером Майклом Ульрихом из Арнштадта, который построил Куполу и высокую башню. В 1799 году шпиль был разрушен прямым ударом молнии, а башня была покрыта временной деревянной структурой. В 1815 году поврежденная башня снова была поражена молнией, и временная четырехслойная крыша стала постоянной.

Title: История голландской национальности
Content: Несмотря на то, что городские правительства демонстрируют редкие признаки демократии, они были в первую очередь олигархической системой, отмеченной исключительной иерархией. Классовые подразделения, однако, были не такими глубокими, как в других европейских государствах, и права, которыми обладал общий класс, не сильно отличались от того, что могли бы практиковать интеллектуалы. Была культурная гармония, и она предотвратила образование двух полностью разделенных классов и позволило участвовать в социальном отношении. Точно так же основа образования была одинаковой для всех, и это позволило для социальной связи. Разница в правах, которыми обладал верхний и нижний класс, была уменьшена до суммы денег, доступной для человека. Если бы кто-то был богат, он мог бы позволить себе образование более высокого уровня. Тем не менее, это само по себе не принесло ему никаких политических привилегий или обширных политических прав, а только способность зарабатывать больше богатства. 
У всего населения Голландской Республики не было выбора голосования за представителя страны, поскольку между демократией и аристократией не было выбора, а скорее между аристократией и монархией. Stadtholder будет членом дома Оранжевого Нассау.

prompt:

Title: Теория клеток
Content: В биологии теория клеток является исторической научной теорией, в настоящее время общепринятой, что живые организмы состоят из клеток, что они являются основной структурной/организационной единицей всех организмов и что все клетки поступают из ранее существовавших клеток. Клетки являются основной единицей структуры во всех организмах, а также основной единицей размножения. С постоянными улучшениями, внесенными в микроскопы с течением времени, технология увеличения достаточно развивалась, чтобы обнаружить клетки в 17 веке. Это открытие в значительной степени связано с Робертом Гуком и начало научное исследование клеток, также известных как клеточная биология. Спустя столетие много дебатов о клетках началось среди ученых. Большинство из этих дебатов включали природу клеточной регенерации и идею клеток как фундаментальной единицы жизни. Теория клеток была в конечном итоге сформулирована в 1839 году. Это обычно приписывается Матиасу Шлейдену и Теодору Шванну. Тем не менее, многие другие ученые, такие как Рудольф Вирхоу, внесли свой вклад в теорию. Это был важный шаг в движении вдали от спонтанного поколения.

Title: University of Toronto
Content: The discovery of insulin at the University of Toronto in 1921 is considered among the most significant events in the history of medicine. The stem cell was discovered at the university in 1963, forming the basis for bone marrow transplantation and all subsequent research on adult and embryonic stem cells. This was the first of many findings at Toronto relating to stem cells, including the identification of pancreatic and retinal stem cells. The cancer stem cell was first identified in 1997 by Toronto researchers, who have since found stem cell associations in leukemia, brain tumors and colorectal cancer. Medical inventions developed at Toronto include the glycaemic index, the infant cereal Pablum, the use of protective hypothermia in open heart surgery and the first artificial cardiac pacemaker. The first successful single-lung transplant was performed at Toronto in 1981, followed by the first nerve transplant in 1988, and the first double-lung transplant in 1989. Researchers identified the maturation promoting factor that regulates cell division, and discovered the T-cell receptor, which triggers responses of the immune system. The university is credited with isolating the genes that cause Fanconi anemia, cystic fibrosis and early-onset Alzheimer's disease, among numerous other diseases. Between 1914 and 1972, the university operated the Connaught Medical Research Laboratories, now part of the pharmaceutical corporation Sanofi-Aventis. Among the research conducted at the laboratory was the development of gel electrophoresis.

Title: Planarian
Content: The planarian has very simple organ systems. The digestive system consists of a mouth, pharynx, and a gastrovascular cavity. The mouth is located in the center of the underside of the body. Digestive enzymes are secreted from the mouth to begin external digestion. The pharynx connects the mouth to the gastrovascular cavity. This structure branches throughout the body allowing nutrients from food to reach all extremities. Planaria eat living or dead small animals that they suck up with their muscular mouths. Food passes from the mouth through the pharynx into the intestines where it is digested by the cells lining the intestines. Then its nutrients diffuse to the rest of the planaria.

Район редко посещается покровителями парка из -за отсутствия извержения деятельности и закрытия определенных областей для широкой общественности.
